text: “Nzan nzɨgi mbe fhum gumgi ki fhuv ŋanen kav, mbe Fhe Bakɨmen sher phen kegi. Mba sher phen, mbe Isreriŋ ana garav kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme guigira mbe phorga ki. Mbe mba sher phena mbuav, mbe guigira mba Fhe Bakɨme Moses ga suaŋgi bunira zɨn vov, ana muuŋgi. Mbe ana muuŋgim, ana guigira mba Moses gangi phenan tumara gangana mbui.
